/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/first-application.dir/first-application.o  -o ../.build/bin/first-application  -L/home/ldf/workspace/mygstreamer/GStreamer-example/.build/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/ldf/workspace/mygstreamer/GStreamer-example/.build/lib -lpthread -lgstreamer-1.0 -lgobject-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -ldirectfb
